text.description: Paragraph text to copy when clicked.

icon.description: Copy icon, can be an array or two icons for before and after clicked.

tooltips.description: Tooltip text, can be an array or two strings for before and after clicked.

oneOf.description: Allow paragraph editing when true, editable settings can be provided with editable object.

maxLength.description: Max length of text area input.

oneOf.description: Display ellipsis when text overflows a single line.

type.description: Additional types. Don't specify for default.

onExpand.description: Trigger action when ellipse expand is clicked.

onCopy.description: Trigger action when copy text is clicked.

onChange.description: Trigger action when paragraph is changed.
